Metadata.title: Hello world!
Metadata.description: This is a simple example of a metadata page.

Header.customWebsiteDesc: Website tailored to your business needs.
Header.webAppDesc: Modern web applications for digital business needs.
Header.companySystemDesc: Management and automation systems for companies.
Header.graphicDesignDesc: Professional visual design for branding and marketing.
Header.whatsappAPIDesc: WhatsApp Business API integration for more effective business communication.
Header.whatsappChatbotDesc: WhatsApp bot with AI to serve customers 24/7 automatically.
Header.seoSpecialistDesc: Website optimization to be easily found on Google.
Header.socialMediaDesc: Manage and improve your social media performance.
Header.googleBusinessDesc: Optimize your Google Business to be easily found.
Header.techSupportDesc: Technical assistance for smooth business operations.

HowToOrder.title: How to Order
HowToOrder.subtitle: Complete guide to placing your order
HowToOrder.description: Follow our comprehensive ordering process to get your project started with Genfity.

orderingProcess.title: Ordering Process
orderingProcess.subtitle: 8 simple steps to complete your order

addToCart.title: Add to Cart
addToCart.description: Browse our services and add your desired products to the cart. You can select multiple services if needed.

fillForm.title: Fill Form
fillForm.description: Complete the order form with your project details, requirements, and contact information.

voucher.title: Apply Voucher
voucher.description: Enter your voucher code if you have one to get discounts on your order.

verifyOrder.title: Verify Order
verifyOrder.description: Review your order details, services selected, and total amount before proceeding.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.description: Confirm your order and proceed to the payment gateway.

payment.title: Payment Gateway
payment.description: Choose your preferred payment method and enter payment details securely.

pay.title: Complete Payment
pay.description: Finalize your payment to start the order processing.

checkStatus.title: Check Order Status
checkStatus.description: Monitor your order progress through our tracking system.

mainWorkflow.title: Main Product Workflow
mainWorkflow.subtitle: How we process your main product orders

orderReceived.title: Order Received
orderReceived.description: Your order is confirmed and added to our processing queue.

whatsappContact.title: WhatsApp Contact
whatsappContact.description: Our team will contact you via WhatsApp for project discussion and clarification.

workExecution.title: Work Execution
workExecution.description: Our expert team starts working on your project according to the specifications.

delivery.title: Project Delivery
delivery.description: Complete project delivered with documentation and support.

meetings.title: Client Meetings
meetings.description: Schedule meetings to discuss revision requirements and feedback.

revisionRequests.title: Revision Requests
revisionRequests.description: Submit detailed revision requests through our platform.

processing.title: Revision Processing
processing.description: Our team implements the requested changes and delivers updated results.

automaticActivation.title: Automatic Activation
automaticActivation.description: Your WhatsApp API service is automatically activated after successful payment.

dashboardAccess.title: Dashboard Access
dashboardAccess.description: Get instant access to your WhatsApp API dashboard to start managing your business communications.

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.description: If you have any questions about the ordering process, feel free to contact our support team.

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.subtitle: Sign in to your account
signIn.description: Login to access your dashboard and manage your account
signIn.sessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired. Please sign in again to continue.
signIn.accessPageMessage: Please sign in to access this page.

form.emailOrPhonePlaceholder: Enter your email or phone number

otp.title: Enter Verification Code
otp.description: We've sent a verification code to

errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during sign in.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.ssoFailed: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
errors.ssoRateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait {seconds} seconds before requesting another code.
errors.ssoUnknownError: An unknown error occurred while sending verification code.
errors.verifyFailed: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
errors.verifyUnknownError: An unknown error occurred during verification.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.subtitle: Create your account
signUp.description: Join us and start your journey with Genfity

verification.title: Verify Your Phone Number
verification.description: We've sent a verification code to
verification.continueDescription: Continue your registration by verifying the code sent to

errors.signupFailed: Failed to sign up. Please try again.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.resendFailed: Failed to resend code. Please try again.
errors.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid WhatsApp number with country code (e.g., +62812345678, 081234567890)
errors.emailExists: An account with this email already exists. Please use a different email or sign in.
errors.phoneExists: An account with this WhatsApp number already exists. Please use a different number or sign in.
errors.userExists: An account with this information already exists. Please sign in instead.
errors.otpExpired: The verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.verificationExpired: The verification deadline has passed. Please register again.
errors.generalError: Registration failed. Please check your information and try again.
errors.registrationInProgress: Registration already in progress. Please verify your OTP or wait for it to expire.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email or phone number to receive a reset code

request.title: Reset Password
request.description: Enter your email or phone number and we'll send you a reset code

form.identifierPlaceholder: Enter your email or phone number

verify.title: Enter Reset Code
verify.description: We've sent a reset code to

success.title: Password Reset Successfully
success.description: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
